title: Orange and Cinnamon Tequila Shot Recipe
description: This is a new twist on taking tequila shots. A pinch of cinnamon, a swig of tequila, and a bite of orange slice to commence your next celebration.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Cocktail Recipes Tequila Drinks Recipes Orange and Cinnamon Tequila Shot 4.7 (3) 3 Reviews 2 Photos My brother taught me this when he came home from college. I LOVED it and have been telling the world since! Submitted by Gabrielle MacMillen Updated on May 2, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 2 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 1 Yield: 1 serving Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 1 servings 1 slice orange, seeds removed 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger tequila Directions Place orange slice between forefinger and thumb of left hand. Lick the skin just below thumb of left hand and sprinkle with a pinch of cinnamon. Place shot of tequila in right hand. Lick cinnamon, drink shot, and bite orange slice. Add Your Photo Photos of Orange and Cinnamon Tequila Shot 01 of 02 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 02 Photo by  Crikkitt 01/16/2015 Who doesn't like a shot of tequila for a quick buzz? I like the taste of the cinnamon before the tequila. I recommend using a good quality tequila. :) 1 You’ll Also Love Salty Chihuahua 33 Ratings Tequini Pushing Up Daisies Mexican Christmas Punch (Ponche Navideno) 1 Rating Grilled Grapefruit Paloma Cocktail 4 Ratings Frozen Raspberry Margaritas 4 Ratings Italian Amaretto Margaritas 86 Ratings Herbed Blackberries on the Rocks Cranberry Margarita 3 Ratings Tequila Sunrise 36 Ratings Mr. Big's White Sangria 6 Ratings Watermelon Refresher 4 Ratings Sangrita Fresca (Mexican Sangrita) 1 Rating Lauren's Grapefruit Margaritas 34 Ratings Hilton Head Iced Tea 2 Ratings Beergarita 5 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Gabrielle MacMillen
instructions: Place orange slice between forefinger and thumb of left hand. Lick the skin just below thumb of left hand and sprinkle with a pinch of cinnamon. Place shot of tequila in right hand. Lick cinnamon, drink shot, and bite orange slice.
